function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Stress on healthcare infrastructure","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, reduced capacity to treat other medical conditions","Mitigation":"Invest in healthcare capacity, surge planning, and disaster response protocols","Technologies":"Telemedicine, AI for resource allocation, remote monitoring","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, high-risk individuals","Owner":"Government, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Strain on the economic system","Impact":"Economic dislocations, unemployment, financial insecurity","Mitigation":"Economic stimulus, support for affected sectors, social safety nets","Technologies":"Digital payment systems, remote work infrastructure, economic forecasting tools","People":"Workers, businesses, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Localized economic hazards","Impact":"Disruption of local markets, supply chain breakdowns","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply chains, local economic support programs","Technologies":"Blockchain for supply chain transparency, predictive analytics for market trends","People":"Local businesses, producers, consumers","Owner":"Local governments, businesses"}]}
